name: Filter
natural_language_description: 这是 Filter 节点。主要用于: Remove items matching a condition

conditions.name: conditions
conditions.description: The type of values to compare
conditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conditions | 作用: The type of values to compare | 默认值: {}

combineConditions.name: combineConditions
combineConditions.description: How to combine the conditions: AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true
combineConditions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Combine Conditions | 作用: How to combine the conditions: AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true | 默认值: AND
available_options: AND (值: AND) - Items are passed to the next node only if they meet all the conditions
OR (值: OR) - Items are passed to the next node if they meet at least one condition
